dependencies.description:
Babel is an integrated collection of utilities that assist in
internationalizing and localizing Python applications, with an emphasis
on web-based applications.
dependencies.name: py-babel

dependencies.description:
This module implements ISO 8601 date, time and duration parsing. The
implementation follows ISO8601:2004 standard, and implements only
date/time representations mentioned in the standard. If something is not
mentioned there, then it is treated as non existent, and not as an
allowed option.
dependencies.name: py-isodate

dependencies.description:
Leather is the Python charting library for those who need charts now and
don't care if they're perfect.
dependencies.name: py-leather

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A Python Slugify application that handles Unicode
dependencies.name: py-python-slugify

dependencies.description: A small Python library to parse various kinds of time expressions.
dependencies.name: py-pytimeparse

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: agate-dbf adds read support for dbf files to agate.
dependent_to.name: py-agate-dbf

dependent_to.description: agate-excel adds read support for Excel files (xls and xlsx) to agate.
dependent_to.name: py-agate-excel

dependent_to.description: agate-sql adds SQL read/write support to agate.
dependent_to.name: py-agate-sql

dependent_to.description:
A library of utilities for working with CSV, the king of tabular file
formats
dependent_to.name: py-csvkit

description:
agate is a Python data analysis library that is optimized for humans
instead of machines. It is an alternative to numpy and pandas that
solves real-world problems with readable code.
name: py-agate

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
